ðŸ“– Summary: Rallies-cli is an AI-powered investment research tool that combines the conversational abilities of AI with real-time financial data. It allows traders and investors to perform complex queries, analyze market trends, and gain insights that are not readily available with traditional tools like ChatGPT due to their lack of real-time data. The tool provides functionalities for technical analysis, news monitoring, and advanced market analysis.
